decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: 06-2022/94DR/400 (Location Plan), 06-2022/94DR/100 (Existing Ground Floor Plan), 06-2022/94DR/101 (Existing First Floor Plan), 06-2022/94DR/102 (Existing Second Floor Plan), 06-2022/94DR/103 (Existing Roof Plan), 06-2022/94DR/104 (Existing Section A-A), 06-2022/94DR/105 (Existing Section B-B), 06-2022/94DR/106 (Existing Side Elevation), 06-2022/94DR/107 (Existing Rear Elevation), 06-2022/94DR/108 (Existing Front Elevation), 06-2022/94DR/200 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan), 06-2022/94DR/201 (Proposed First Floor Plan), 06-2022/94DR/202 (Proposed Second Floor Plan), 06-2022/94DR/203 (Proposed Roof Plan), 06-2022/94DR/204 (Proposed Section A-A), 06-2022/94DR/205 (Proposed Section B-B), 06-2022/94DR/207 (Proposed Side Elevation), 06-2022/94DR/208 (Proposed Rear Elevation), 06-2022/94DR/209 (Proposed Front Elevation).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012). | The proposed ^IN; on the side elevations shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policies policy 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012). | The hereby approved one rooflights to the front roof slope and five rooflights to the rear roofs of the approved development shall not project more than 150mm from the plane of the roof slope when measured perpendicularly and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the area in accordance with policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
description: Single storey side/rear extension (following demolition of existing conservatory); rear roof extension incorporating a Juliet balcony; rear outrigger roof extension, installation of one rooflight to the front roofslope (following removal of one rooflight)
